text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO Trump's declaring battle with Civid-19 a War. Trump not accepting free test kits from the WHO was so Jared kushner's family pharmaceutical company could Patent technology about Coronavirus. It's slowed down US's response to the virus costing US lives. He needs to be accountable.
